data.text: @SenJohnHoeven @Budweiser This is acceptable to you? https://t.co/dUVZ0gQFWI

@SenJohnHoeven @Budweiser Islamic regime  in Iran is a threat to all countries around the world. Please end this regime NOW @POTUS
and bring peace to the world. Do not negotiate with this terrorist regime. Reza Palavi is our legitimate leader. #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026 #KingRezaPahlavi
@SenJohnHoeven @Budweiser That's great.  Greater would be full throat support of the Save Act to protect voting rights and prevent fraud. LETS GO! https://t.co/HpiYauNiHb

@SenJohnHoeven @Budweiser The issue isn’t just casualties—it’s the regime. A state sponsor of terror that lies, represses, and kills its people is a threat to U.S. security. Appeasement failed. Stand with Iranians by isolating the regime.
#StandWithIran #NoAppeasement #IRGCTerrorists https://t.co/OsHS8jTnj1
